txt.en: 'So, now that you live in a proper home, you will likely want to decorate it a bit? My good friend Rambi can certainly help you out -- you can find him in the market square within the community itself. Rambi has many fine things for sale!'

'Greetings, [placeholder], and welcome to our fine community! Of course, a home isn't much of a home until it has been properly furnished and decorated. That is where I come in!\n\n'To get folk started, I like to offer a little something to our newest customers -- think of it as a homewarming gift from me to you.'
You now have a place to call home, but it would be even nicer with some fine decorations.
Rambi is in the market square within the Thorin's Hall homestead.\n\nRÃºni has told you to speak with his friend Rambi about acquiring goods for your house.
